item.name: inventory
Get the inventory of the catalog

query.description:
Filters the inventory by one or more authors having exact match.  
The filter works additive to other filters.

Filters the inventory by one or more manufacturers having exact match.  
The filter works additive to other filters.

Filters the inventory by one ore more mpn (manufacturer part number) having exact match.   
The filter works additive to other filters.

Filters the inventory by inventory entry name (consisting of 'author/manufacturer/mpn') having a prefix match.   
The filter works additive to other filters.

Filters the inventory according to whether the content of the inventory entries matches the given search.    
The search works additive to other filters.

response.name: Successful operation

item.name: Get an inventory entry by it's name

response.name: Successful operation

item.name: Get the versions of an inventory entry

request.description: Returns the versions of an inventory entry by it`s name

response.name: Successful operation

item.description: Access to the inventory of the catalog

item.name: Get the content of a Thing Model by its ID or fetch name

variable.description: (Required) ID or fetch name of the Thing Model

request.description: Returns the actual content of a Thing Model. The Thing Model is selected by the ID or fetch name. Fetch name is defined as \<name\>[:\<semver\>],  where \<name\> is the inventory name, \<semver\> is a full or partial semantic version. Using \<semver\> will return the most recent version of the TM that matches the provided part of semantic version

response.name:
Successful operation 

**For the schema of the returned Thing Model see** [Thing Model JSON schema](https://github.com/w3c/wot-thing-description/blob/main/validation/tm-json-schema-validation.json)
Invalid ID or fetch name supplied
Content of the Thing Model not found

item.name: Get the contained authors of the inventory

query.description:
Filters the authors according to whether they have inventory entries  
which belong to at least one of the given manufacturers with an exact match.  
The filter works additive to other filters.

Filters the authors according to whether they have inventory entries    
which belong to at least one of the given mpn (manufacturer part number) with an exact match.    
The filter works additive to other filters.

Filters the authors according to whether they have inventory entries  
where their content matches the given search.      
The search works additive to other filters.

request.description: Returns the contained authors of the inventory

item.name: Get the contained manufacturers of the inventory

query.description:
Filters the manufacturers according to whether they belong to at least one of the given authors with an exact match.       
The filter works additive to other filters.

Filters the manufacturers according to whether they have inventory entries    
which belong to at least one of the given mpn (manufacturer part number) with an exact match.    
The filter works additive to other filters.

Filters the manufacturers according to whether they have inventory entries  
where their content matches the given search.      
The search works additive to other filters.

request.description: Returns the contained manufacturers of the inventory

item.name: mpns
Get the contained mpns (manufacturer part numbers) of the inventory

query.description:
Filters the mpns according to whether they belong to at least one of the given authors with an exact match.     
The filter works additive to other filters.

Filters the mpns according to whether they belong to at least one of the given manufacturers with an exact match.     
The filter works additive to other filters.

Filters the mpns according to whether their inventory entry content matches the given search.        
The search works additive to other filters.

request.description: Returns the mpns (manufacturer part numbers) of the inventory

item.description: Access to mpns (manufacturer part numbers) information

item.name: Get the overall health of the service

request.description: Get the overall health of the service, aggregates the responses from the /health/live and /health/ready

item.name: Returns the liveliness of the service

request.description: Returns the liveliness of the service, or whether it encountered a bug or deadlock

item.name: Returns the readiness of the service

request.description: Returns the readiness of the service, or whether it is ready to process requests

item.name: Returns whether the service is initialized

request.description: Returns whether the service is initialized
